system.description:
Trigger: User's partner uses Z-Pose! and triggers the appropriate Z-Power-Crystal
Effect: The user's default ATK, DEF, SPATK, SPDEF, and SPD increase by +1, and heals 50% of their Max HP. If the user is an Eevee, the user's default stats increase by another +1 and have their HP fully restored.
Requirement: [Eevee] Z-Power-Crystal as an Accessory Item and Last Resort on the user's Active List.

actions.name: Extreme Evoboost

cost.trigger: User's partner uses Z-Pose! and triggers the appropriate Z-Power-Crystal
